entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 45 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -34.1°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
